newsitem.title: USA: Equitable to supply natgas to Conn. casino.
newsitem.headline: Equitable to supply natgas to Conn. casino.

text.p: Equitable Resources Inc said its ERI Services subsidiary won a competition to supply natural gas and other energy services for the Mohegan Sun Casino in Uncasville, Conn., which opened in October.

The sale of some 6.5 million cubic feet of natgas per year to the casino is expected to generate revenue of about $565,000 annually with an annual $140,000 projected energy savings to the casino, Equitable said.

In addition to the natgas, ERI Services expects to also provide energy conservation engineering and energy system design for future buildings to be built at the casino. ERI is developing a comprehensive natgas program for casino vehicles.
